text: Robert B. Pirie Jr. (born September 10, 1933) is a retired United States Navy officer and politician. He was born in San Diego, California. Pirie served as acting United States Secretary of the Navy until the nomination and confirmation of an appointee by President George W. Bush from January to September 2001. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Navy biography Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Navy Category:Politicians from San Diego Category:Military people from California
title: Robert B. Pirie Jr.
